title: Crypt0Gore
author: Crypt0Gore
content: I start developing an interest in Boxing and UFC matches when I visited a relative, he is so into these types of sports and he seems to know a lot about it, by I have to keep myself from asking him what and what I should do to know more about such sports, I have this in mind to be able to make some bets or gamble on such sports, my problem is I don't know how, if anyone is into such sports where should I begin? Any special UFC or Boxing platform where I can read news and updates about such sports? How do you bet on such games? What are the things to be on the lookout for? Because I believe this is different from football ⚽, I also don't have access to satellite dish like my relative does, this is how he is able to get the best out of these sports.what information can you give someone like me?

comments.author: Cryptomiles1
comments.body: I see your passion for Boxing is gradually growing but you can't start instantly to place bet about them since you have little knowledge about that area of sport. Even in esport betting (football) you didn't just start a day before jumping into it, at least you developed time for it by constantly watching football and matches before you know some popular teams to bet or not to bet, my best advise is that you should get DStv dish installed and subscribe to those channels, maybe within just 3 to 9 months you would understand how it works because even though you being told how to bet it i don't think all things would be capture since is not something you started from the onset. I think there are other threads that says about boxing you can develop interest by reading them here.

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: Quote from: Crypt0Gore on April 26, 2023, 10:24:45 AM I don't know how, if anyone is into such sports where should I begin? Any special UFC or Boxing platform where I can read news and updates about such sports? Subscribe on sports outlet like ESPN and Yahoo sports so that you will notified if there’s news about upcoming matches. Or simply just check regularly the gambling discussion board since users here usually create topic once there’s upcoming interesting match.Quote from: Crypt0Gore on April 26, 2023, 10:24:45 AM How do you bet on such games? What are the things to be on the lookout for? Because I believe this is different from football ⚽, I also don't have access to satellite dish like my relative does, this is how he is able to get the best out of these sports.what information can you give someone like me?The secret on betting with this kind of sports is the consistency on watching and analyzing the fighter that you want to bet. This sports is physical and the result can be overturned in a split second with one lucky punch/kick.I only bet on fighter that I know very the fighting skills. It’s very hard to become updated to all the fighters. Concentrating on your favorite fighter will make analysis easier for you. You can bet on your fighter or bet on the opponent if you knew exactly his skills. You can easily predict if he is in advantage or disadvantage. Just bet using your brain and by your heart. Being biased will give you a problem on choosing the right pick since this is a physical sports.

There is an app for smartphones, but also for Android/Smart TV, although the program offer varies from country to country. If you are wondering how it is possible to watch something for free, the key is in advertisements, something similar to what exists on YT.For more information, visit their website -> Watch Sports Free

Just watch, and keep watching. If you think you've seen enough, go watch some more. Interest in sports come from seeing it once, knowledge of it comes from watching it a LOT of times imo. You don't even need to be able to participate or play it, just watching should be more than enough, just that it's going to take a LOT of watching imo. As for news about a specific sport, well, that comes from where you really want to get to know about them, I'd say find your own really so that it can suite your actual needs. You don't need a satellite dish to be able to get latest news, having access to the internet is more than good enough imo.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: in my opinion the best way for you to learn how everything works is to do the following:start reading and posting in the ce UFC and Boxing sections, because when you read some member posts in this section you will be curious to google the fighters they are talking about and how every day you are reading comments about various fights and fighters and always research to find out more about the subject being discussed so you start to gain a lot of knowledge about UFC and Boxing, please note that it is not advisable to place a bet based on someone else's prediction, you should read the comments for acquire knowledgenow about the betting part, betting on a game is not easy and in each sport there is a basic and common way to do analysis which consists of analyzing the last 5 fights or 5 last games or 5 last race if it is a car race like F1 for For example, in the case of UFC and Boxing, you can watch several videos of the two fighters in their last 5 fights, you can read predictions on websites, read comments on YouTube, so you start to have an idea of who to bet on, of course there are also many markets within a game as well as in a fight when the person is going to place a bet, you have to do research to find out whether to bet that fighter X will win or bet on knockout in the 1st round, in the end it will depend on your analysis

In fact, unexpected winning results often occur.When we bet, maybe research to make predictions can provide a little opportunity, but the research we will use is just a past experience and will be much different when the battle in the octagon takes place.
